text: American Samoa at the Olympics is a history which includes 12 games in 11 countries and 30+ athletes.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), American Samoa ; retrieved 2012-10-12. Since 1988, American Samoa has contributed to the growth of the "Olympic Movement".Olympics.org, "Factsheet: The Olympic Movement"; retrieved 2012-10-12. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for American Samoa is ASA."Abbreviations, National Olympic Committees," 2009 Annual Report, p. 91 [PDF p. 92 of 94]; retrieved 2012-10-12. ==History== The National Olympic Committee for American Samoa was formed in 1987; and it was recognized by the International Olympic Committee the same year.Olympic.org, American Samoa; retrieved 2012-10-11. Teams from American Samoa have take part in Summer Olympic Games. Samoan athletes went to two of the Winter Olympic Games. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes *American Samoa *Summer Olympic Games *Winter Olympic Games ==References== == Other websites == * American Samoa profile at London2012.com Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:Sports in American Samoa
title: American Samoa at the Olympics
